verses.verse: וְשָׂרַי֙ <S%H8297><s%> Now Sarai אֵ֣שֶׁת <S%H802><s%> wife אַבְרָ֔ם <S%H87><s%> Abram's לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> him no יָלְדָ֖ה <S%H3205><s%> children ל֑וֹ וְלָ֛הּ שִׁפְחָ֥ה <S%H8198><s%> and she had an handmaid מִצְרִ֖ית <S%H4713><s%> an Egyptian וּשְׁמָ֥הּ <S%H8034><s%> whose name הָגָֽר׃ <S%H1904><s%> [was] Hagar

וַתֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said שָׂרַ֜י <S%H8297><s%> And Sarai אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to אַבְרָ֗ם <S%H87><s%> unto Abram הִנֵּה־ <S%H2009><s%> behold נָ֞א <S%H4994><s%> Now עֲצָרַ֤נִי <S%H6113><s%> hath restrained me יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> Behold now the LORD מִלֶּ֔דֶת <S%H3205><s%> from bearing בֹּא־ <S%H935><s%> I pray thee go in נָא֙ <S%H4994><s%> Please אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to שִׁפְחָתִ֔י <S%H8198><s%> unto my maid אוּלַ֥י <S%H194><s%> it may אִבָּנֶ֖ה <S%H1129><s%> be that I may obtain children מִמֶּ֑נָּה <S%H4480><s%> through וַיִּשְׁמַ֥ע <S%H8085><s%> hearkened אַבְרָ֖ם <S%H87><s%> by her And Abram לְק֥וֹל <S%H6963><s%> to the voice שָׂרָֽי׃ <S%H8297><s%> of Sarai

וַתִּקַּ֞ח <S%H3947><s%> took שָׂרַ֣י <S%H8297><s%> And Sarai אֵֽשֶׁת־ <S%H802><s%> wife אַבְרָ֗ם <S%H87><s%> Abram's אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָגָ֤ר <S%H1904><s%> Hagar הַמִּצְרִית֙ <S%H4713><s%> the Egyptian שִׁפְחָתָ֔הּ <S%H8198><s%> her maid מִקֵּץ֙ <S%H7093><s%> after עֶ֣שֶׂר <S%H6235><s%> ten שָׁנִ֔ים <S%H8141><s%> years לְשֶׁ֥בֶת <S%H3427><s%> had dwelt אַבְרָ֖ם <S%H87><s%> Abram בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in the land כְּנָ֑עַן <S%H3667><s%> of Canaan וַתִּתֵּ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> and gave אֹתָ֛הּ <S%H853><s%> לְאַבְרָ֥ם <S%H87><s%> Abram אִישָׁ֖הּ <S%H582><s%> another ל֥וֹ לְאִשָּֽׁה׃ <S%H802><s%> to be his wife

וַיָּבֹ֥א <S%H935><s%> And he went in אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הָגָ֖ר <S%H1904><s%> unto Hagar וַתַּ֑הַר <S%H2029><s%> and she conceived וַתֵּ֙רֶא֙ <S%H7200><s%> and when she saw כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for הָרָ֔תָה <S%H2029><s%> that she had conceived וַתֵּקַ֥ל <S%H7043><s%> was despised גְּבִרְתָּ֖הּ <S%H1404><s%> her mistress בְּעֵינֶֽיהָ׃ <S%H5869><s%> in her eyes

וַתֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said שָׂרַ֣י <S%H8297><s%> And Sarai אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to אַבְרָם֮ <S%H87><s%> unto Abram חֲמָסִ֣י <S%H2555><s%> My wrong עָלֶיךָ֒ <S%H5921><s%> and אָנֹכִ֗י <S%H595><s%> I נָתַ֤תִּי <S%H5414><s%> [be] upon thee I have given שִׁפְחָתִי֙ <S%H8198><s%> my maid בְּחֵיקֶ֔ךָ <S%H2436><s%> into thy bosom וַתֵּ֙רֶא֙ <S%H7200><s%> and when she saw כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for הָרָ֔תָה <S%H2029><s%> that she had conceived וָאֵקַ֖ל <S%H7043><s%> I was despised בְּעֵינֶ֑יהָ <S%H5869><s%> in her eyes יִשְׁפֹּ֥ט <S%H8199><s%> judge יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD בֵּינִ֥י <S%H996><s%> between וּבֵינֶֽיׅךָ׃ <S%H996><s%> between

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said אַבְרָ֜ם <S%H87><s%> But Abram אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to שָׂרַ֗י <S%H8297><s%> unto Sarai הִנֵּ֤ה <S%H2009><s%> Behold שִׁפְחָתֵךְ֙ <S%H8198><s%> Behold thy maid בְּיָדֵ֔ךְ <S%H3027><s%> [is] in thy hand עֲשִׂי־ <S%H6213><s%> do לָ֖הּ הַטּ֣וֹב <S%H2896><s%> to her what בְּעֵינָ֑יִךְ <S%H5869><s%> your sight וַתְּעַנֶּ֣הָ <S%H6031><s%> dealt hardly with שָׂרַ֔י <S%H8297><s%> And when Sarai וַתִּבְרַ֖ח <S%H1272><s%> her she fled מִפָּנֶֽיהָ׃ <S%H6440><s%> from her face

וַֽיִּמְצָאָ֞הּ <S%H4672><s%> found her מַלְאַ֧ךְ <S%H4397><s%> And the angel יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> by עֵ֥ין <S%H5869><s%> by a fountain הַמַּ֖יִם <S%H4325><s%> of water בַּמִּדְבָּ֑ר <S%H4057><s%> in the wilderness עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> by הָעַ֖יִן <S%H5869><s%> by the fountain בְּדֶ֥רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> in the way שֽׁוּר׃ <S%H7793><s%> to Shur

וַיֹּאמַ֗ר <S%H559><s%> And he said הָגָ֞ר <S%H1904><s%> Hagar שִׁפְחַ֥ת <S%H8198><s%> maid שָׂרַ֛י <S%H8297><s%> Sarai's אֵֽי־ <S%H335><s%> whence מִזֶּ֥ה <S%H2088><s%> have you בָ֖את <S%H935><s%> camest thou וְאָ֣נָה <S%H575><s%> and where תֵלֵ֑כִי <S%H1980><s%> He וַתֹּ֕אמֶר <S%H559><s%> ? And she said מִפְּנֵי֙ <S%H6440><s%> from the face שָׂרַ֣י <S%H8297><s%> Sarai גְּבִרְתִּ֔י <S%H1404><s%> of my mistress אָנֹכִ֖י <S%H595><s%> I בֹּרַֽחַת׃ <S%H1272><s%> I flee

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said לָהּ֙ מַלְאַ֣ךְ <S%H4397><s%> And the angel יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD שׁ֖וּבִי <S%H7725><s%> unto her Return אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to גְּבִרְתֵּ֑ךְ <S%H1404><s%> to thy mistress וְהִתְעַנִּ֖י <S%H6031><s%> and submit תַּ֥חַת <S%H8478><s%> Thahash יָדֶֽיהָ׃ <S%H3027><s%> thyself under her hands

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said לָהּ֙ מַלְאַ֣ךְ <S%H4397><s%> And the angel יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD הַרְבָּ֥ה <S%H7235><s%> unto her I will multiply אַרְבֶּ֖ה <S%H7235><s%> exceedingly אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> זַרְעֵ֑ךְ <S%H2233><s%> thy seed וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> will be too יִסָּפֵ֖ר <S%H5608><s%> that it shall not be numbered מֵרֹֽב׃ <S%H7230><s%> for multitude

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said לָהּ֙ מַלְאַ֣ךְ <S%H4397><s%> And the angel יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD הִנָּ֥ךְ <S%H2009><s%> unto her Behold הָרָ֖ה <S%H2030><s%> thou [art] with child וְיֹלַ֣דְתְּ <S%H3205><s%> and shalt bear בֵּ֑ן <S%H1121><s%> a son וְקָרָ֤את <S%H7121><s%> and shalt call שְׁמוֹ֙ <S%H8034><s%> his name יִשְׁמָעֵ֔אל <S%H3458><s%> Ishmael כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> Because שָׁמַ֥ע <S%H8085><s%> hath heard יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> because the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to עָנְיֵֽךְ׃ <S%H6040><s%> thy affliction

וְה֤וּא <S%H1931><s%> he יִהְיֶה֙ <S%H1961><s%> will be a פֶּ֣רֶא <S%H6501><s%> And he will be a wild אָדָ֔ם <S%H120><s%> man יָד֣וֹ <S%H3027><s%> his hand בַכֹּ֔ל <S%H3605><s%> everyone וְיַ֥ד <S%H3027><s%> [will be] against every man and every man's hand כֹּ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> and everyone's בּ֑וֹ וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> unto פְּנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> in the presence כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> of all אֶחָ֖יו <S%H251><s%> of all his brethren יִשְׁכֹּֽן׃ <S%H7931><s%> against him and he shall dwell

וַתִּקְרָ֤א <S%H7121><s%> And she called שֵׁם־ <S%H8034><s%> the name יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD הַדֹּבֵ֣ר <S%H1696><s%> that spake אֵלֶ֔יהָ <S%H413><s%> about אַתָּ֖ה <S%H859><s%> you אֵ֣ל <S%H410><s%> unto her Thou God רֳאִ֑י <S%H7210><s%> seest me כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for אָֽמְרָ֗ה <S%H559><s%> for she said הֲגַ֥ם <S%H1571><s%> even הֲלֹ֛ם <S%H1988><s%> Have I also here רָאִ֖יתִי <S%H7200><s%> looked אַחֲרֵ֥י <S%H310><s%> after him רֹאִֽי׃ <S%H7200><s%> remained

עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and כֵּן֙ <S%H3651><s%> after that קָרָ֣א <S%H7121><s%> was called לַבְּאֵ֔ר <S%H875><s%> Wherefore the well בְּאֵ֥ר לַחַ֖י רֹאִ֑י <S%H883><s%> Beer-lahai-roi הִנֵּ֥ה <S%H2009><s%> behold בֵין־ <S%H996><s%> is between קָדֵ֖שׁ <S%H6946><s%> behold [it is] between Kadesh וּבֵ֥ין <S%H996><s%> is between בָּֽרֶד׃ <S%H1260><s%> and Bered

וַתֵּ֧לֶד <S%H3205><s%> bare הָגָ֛ר <S%H1904><s%> And Hagar לְאַבְרָ֖ם <S%H87><s%> Abram בֵּ֑ן <S%H1121><s%> a son וַיִּקְרָ֨א <S%H7121><s%> called אַבְרָ֧ם <S%H87><s%> and Abram שֶׁם־ <S%H8034><s%> name בְּנ֛וֹ <S%H1121><s%> his son's אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> whom יָלְדָ֥ה <S%H3205><s%> bare הָגָ֖ר <S%H1904><s%> which Hagar יִשְׁמָעֵֽאל׃ <S%H3458><s%> Ishmael

וְאַבְרָ֕ם <S%H87><s%> And Abram בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> old שְׁמֹנִ֥ים <S%H8084><s%> was eighty-six שָׁנָ֖ה <S%H8141><s%> years וְשֵׁ֣שׁ <S%H8337><s%> and six שָׁנִ֑ים <S%H8141><s%> years בְּלֶֽדֶת־ <S%H3205><s%> bare הָגָ֥ר <S%H1904><s%> when Hagar אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יִשְׁמָעֵ֖אל <S%H3458><s%> Ishmael לְאַבְרָֽם׃ <S%H87><s%> to Abram ס
